titleStmt.title: Catch that catch can, or, A choice collection of catches, rounds & canons for 3 or 4 voyces collected & published by John Hilton ...
titleStmt.author: Hilton, John, 1599-1657.
Playford, John, 1623-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Benson & John Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: A collection of canons, catches and rounds by Hilton, together with similar compositions by 21 other composers.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
